posts.post_content:
I've decided it's time to part with my last Carolina Brights now that I have my first baby on the way and need a bigger home.

Looking for offers on this T206 Arellanes Carolina Brights - SGC 40/3. Looking to sell, not trade.

If you're into pop reports, here's the data:

SGC: 3 graded examples. 2 are 40s, 1 is 70

PSA: 3 graded examples. 1 is 2Q, 2 are 2's

Payment: PayPal (friends/family no fees), money order

SOLD!

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/t206-Frank-Arellanes-Carolina-Brights-SGC-40-VG.jpg[/IMG]

I think I've now responded to all offer PMs and emails, thank you. I'll give it until Sunday evening before making my final decision given emails/PMs are still coming in. Thank you all for the interest and offers!
